Detailed Description

This interface is used to create an editor for an associated file type.

virtual ContentViewParser* IFileTypePlugin::createParser (  )  [pure virtual]

Create a content view parser, this content view parser will any file (of the correct type of course) If the parser is null, no content view will be load.
